Module klotski_ids
Package klotski_ids.models

Class Helper

java.lang.Object
klotski_ids.models.Helper
public class Helper extends Object
The Helper class provides utility methods for various operations.

    • getRectangleAreaPoints

      public static List<javafx.geometry.Point2D> getRectangleAreaPoints(javafx.scene.shape.Rectangle rectangle, int colIndex, int rowIndex)
      Returns a list of points representing the area covered by the specified rectangle at the given column and row index

      in a grid pane.

      Parameters:
      rectangle - the rectangle for which to retrieve the area points
      colIndex - the column index in the grid pane where the rectangle is located
      rowIndex - the row index in the grid pane where the rectangle is located
      Returns:
      a list of Point2D objects representing the area covered by the rectangle

    • isMoveValid

      public static boolean isMoveValid(javafx.scene.shape.Rectangle rectangle, int col, int row)
      Checks if a move is valid for a given rectangle in the specified row and column.
      Parameters:
      rectangle - the rectangle to be moved
      col - the new column to move the rectangle to
      row - the new row to move the rectangle to
      Returns:
      true if the move is valid, false otherwise

    • overlaps

      public static boolean overlaps(javafx.scene.layout.GridPane gridPane, javafx.scene.shape.Rectangle rectangle, int newCol, int newRow)
      Checks if a given rectangle overlaps with any other rectangles on the specified cell position on a GridPane.
      Parameters:
      gridPane - The GridPane object to search for overlapping rectangles.
      rectangle - The Rectangle object to check for overlaps.
      newCol - The column index of the new position to check for overlaps.
      newRow - The row index of the new position to check for overlaps.
      Returns:
      True if the given rectangle overlaps with any other rectangles on the specified cell position, false otherwise.

    • createRectangle

      public static List<javafx.scene.shape.Rectangle> createRectangle(List<Components> components)
      Creates a list of rectangles based on the components passed as argument.
      Parameters:
      components - a list of Components objects from which to create the rectangles.
      Returns:
      a list of Rectangle objects created from the Components objects.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the components list is null.

    • setGridPaneElements

      public static void setGridPaneElements(javafx.scene.layout.GridPane gridPane, List<Components> components, List<javafx.scene.shape.Rectangle> rectangles)
      Adds to the grid the rectangles associated with the specified components, positioning them according to the information contained in their respective Components objects. If the number of components or rectangles is greater than the other, only the first n pairs will be considered, where n is the minimum between the two numbers.
      Parameters:
      gridPane - the grid to which the rectangles are added
      components - the list of components
      rectangles - the list of rectangles

      public static boolean isSameComponentsList(List<Components> componentsList1, List<Components> componentsList2)
      Checks if two lists of Components are the same.
      Parameters:
      componentsList1 - the first list of Components
      componentsList2 - the second list of Components
      Returns:
      true if the lists are the same, false otherwise
